body.raw:
Justin Mitchell has worked in low latency systems in traditional finance for over 20 years, of
which, the last 15 years has been in systems developed in Erlang.
Justin has now switched to blockchain technology and is working in the core.
body.html: Justin Mitchell has worked in low latency systems in traditional finance for over 20 years, of which, the last 15 years has been in systems developed in Erlang. Justin has now switched to blockchain technology and is working in the core.
